content.text:
# 1990 Pilkington Glass Championships – Singles

Martina Navratilova
| runner   =  Gretchen Magers
| score    = 6–0, 6–2
| type     = singles doubles
| main_name = Eastbourne International
| draw     = 64 (4/8)
| seeds    = 16
}}
Martina Navratilova won her third consecutive title, and her ninth overall title at Eastbourne, by defeating Gretchen Magers 6–0, 6–2 in the final.
Seeds
Martina Navratilova (champion)
#  Zina Garrison (second round)
#  Mary Joe Fernández (quarterfinals, retired)
#  Helena Suková (quarterfinals)
#  Natasha Zvereva (quarterfinals)
#  Jennifer Capriati (second round)
#  Jana Novotná (semifinals)
#  Barbara Paulus (first round)
#  Nathalie Tauziat (third round)
#  Amy Frazier (second round)
#  Rosalyn Fairbank-Nideffer (third round)
#  Raffaella Reggi (second round)
#  Gigi Fernández (first round)
#  Leila Meskhi (third round)
#  Catarina Lindqvist (second round)
#  Claudia Porwik (first round)
}}
